H0.text: the roman name for a liberal arts education is known as. Studia Generalia

H1.text: the roman name for a liberal arts education is known as. Disciplinae Liberae

H2.text: the roman name for a liberal arts education is known as. Humanitas Studia

H3.text: the roman name for a liberal arts education is known as. artes liberales

A4.text: The first recorded use of the term 'liberal arts' (artes liberales) occurs in De Inventione by Marcus Tullius Cicero
